701566f-a.text:
(1)
Park Avenue, at the S.E. corner of East 162nd Street, showing the Melrose Station of the New York and Harlem Division of the New York Central Railroad. This is the south side of the station.
February 17, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Another view of the station as seen from East 161st Street.
February 17, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

700194f-a.text:
Washington Avenue, at the southeast corner of E. 162nd Street,
showing the Municipal Court House.
P. L. Sperr  April 30, 1941
No Reproductions
